document.full_text: tunisia has dissolved its hated security agencies and egypt is reforming its own domestic spying system, giving hope to activists across the region who say the moves could herald the dawn of the real arab revolution.
document.title: iron security curtains torn down in egypt/tunisia
lines_and_colors: tunisia has dissolved its hated security agencies and egypt is reforming its own domestic spying system, giving hope to activists across the region who say the moves could herald the dawn of the real arab revolution.
